# muteStateKey

**Type Property**

A user information key to determine the app’s audio mute state.

## Declaration

```swift
class let muteStateKey: String
```

## Discussion

Use this key to retrieve the app’s mute state from an [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioApplication/inputMuteStateChangeNotification].
title: muteStateKey
